createLink

public static org.apache.wicket.ajax.markup.html.AjaxLink<String> createLink(String id,
                                                                             org.apache.wicket.model.IModel<String> model,
                                                                             CallbackAction action)
creates a new AjaxButton that executes a CallbackAction.

Parameters:
id - Button id.
model - Link model.
action - CallbackAction that will be executed on button press.
Returns:
Returns a new AjaxButton that will execute the specified Bo2WicketBlock.

createLink

public static org.apache.wicket.ajax.markup.html.AjaxLink<String> createLink(String id,
                                                                             CallbackAction action)
Creates a new AjaxLink that executes a CallbackAction. The button will be created with a ResourceModel for the expression link.id , where id is the id specified.

Parameters:
id - Button id.
action - CallbackAction that will be executed on button press.
Returns:
Returns a new AjaxButton that will execute the specified Bo2WicketBlock.

createTogleVisibleLink

public static <T> org.apache.wicket.ajax.markup.html.AjaxLink<T> createTogleVisibleLink(String componentName,
                                                                                        org.apache.wicket.MarkupContainer container)
Creates an AjaxLink that togles on/of the visibility of a component. The Component must have outputMarkUpPlaceholderId = true.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of link model object.
Parameters:
componentName - Name of the panel who's visibility is toggled on/off.
container - - O container that contains the component and the link.
Returns:
Returns the link.
